text: Ceroplesis aulica is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Pascoe in 1875. It is known from the Republic of Congo, the Democratic Republic of Congo, and Angola.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis aulica. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==Varietas== * Ceroplesis aulica var. congoana Fiedler, 1938 * Ceroplesis aulica var. mechowi Quedenfeldt, 1882 * Ceroplesis aulica var. sutureconjuncta Breuning, 1970 ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1875
title: Ceroplesis aulica
